EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Reminder - Nov18 Flow
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Flow Webinar Starting in 20 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for the Intapp Flow webinar. It will start in 20 minutes, at 8:00am Pacific / 11:00am Eastern / 4:00pm GMT.
To join the webinar:
URL: https://intappinc.webex.com/intappinc/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=499841060
Once you join the WebEx you will see the audio conference details. If you are outside of the US, you may need to click on the “show all global call-in numbers” link to find your call-in number.
If you have any difficulties joining the WebEx, please send me an email.
Regards,
Lea Schweitzer Sr. Marketing Specialist Intapp - Software for a Changing Legal Market
